# tasks

**Instance Property**

The individual tasks found by the search.

## Declaration

```swift
var tasks: [INTask]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When searching for items of type [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INNotebookItemType/task] or `reminder`, put the results of your search in this property. Assign a value to the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForNotebookItemsIntentResponse/sortType] property that indicates how you sorted the results.

## Specifying the Search Results

- **notes**: The notes found by the search.
- **taskLists**: The task lists found by the search.
- **sortType**: An indicator of how you sorted the search results.
- **INSortType**: Constants indicating how the intent sorted the search results.
